item.title: This Same Jesus
item.description:
This Same Jesus by Elder Hugh B. Brown, Of the Council of the Twelve given in Session 8 of 141st Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 1971
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Hugh B. Brown, Of the Council of the Twelve

item.title: A Missionary and His Message
item.description:
A Missionary and His Message by Elder Hugh B. Brown, Of the Council of the Twelve given in Session 6 of 142nd Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 1972
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
